subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin scored a power-play goal and Marc-Andre Fleury made 18 saves for his fourth N.H.L. playoff shutout in a victory over the Montreal Canadiens.
snippet: Evgeni Malkin scored a power-play goal and Marc-Andre Fleury made 18 saves for his fourth N.H.L. playoff shutout in a victory over the Montreal Canadiens.
